website_summaries.verdict: If you've got the space, this large combination (microwave and convection) oven won't disappoint.
pros: This large combo (microwave and convection) oven unit offers ample oven space (4 cubic feet) and a large and powerful microwave (2 cubic feet, 1200 watts)
cons: Some users dislike the microwave's alarm and beep and some needed repairs to the microwave unit shortly after purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Buying large items over the internet unseen is always worrisome so I was a little skeptical with the prospects of having any problems. However, everything worked well and received delivery on time with no problems at all. There was an option to plug the Microwave into the Oven, but that was necessary because we had an additional outlet.
customer_reviews.author: JB Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great value and DIY Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I don't give out 5 star reviews often but For the value and shipping etc it is worthy. I do almost all my home projects and this replacement want bad. Make sure to confirm measurements of your opening prior to purchase. My cabinet opening turned out an inch shallow because I assumed similar size of the old oven. Not a big deal really and I may retrofit it at some point. The shipping was great and the packaging was almost all recyclable which is unusual for this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: All well that ends well
customer_reviews.text: Two orders got cross shipped on loading dock. Talked with shipper and got product on next available truck. Product as advertised and that is great. Works like a champ and customer service was great. Would use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: My suggestion is to buy at a local store for items like
customer_reviews.text: The microwave stopped working after just one use. Had to find a professional to fix it cost $200 to replace the broken part. My suggestion is to buy at a local store for items like this
customer_reviews.author: 99 Review

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first major appliance purchase from Amazon. We are extremely happy. The price was great, delivery was fast and we are very happy with the microwave oven unit. This replaces a 20 year old Jenn Air unit that had all the bells and whistles. This one has fewer extras, but was also much less expensive and we are very happy with it so far. Overall ordering through Amazon was a very positive experience for us. Would order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and shiny
customer_reviews.text: The product so far has been great! It is large (wide), and the sites aren't too clear when saying the measurements. It looks very nice, really enlighten my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanrivera

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Fan a little noisy but otherwise very good oven and microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Robungus Whipsnead

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the very large microwave and the fast preheat for the oven! All features are easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: REPLACED OVEN & MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.text: MEASUREMENTS WERE EXACT AS STATED- GREAT FIT ! THE TOP OF MICROWAVE NEEDED A MOLDING.
customer_reviews.author: gamestand

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Champ
customer_reviews.text: - Easy Installation and setup. - Looks great - Works like a champ - Cooks faster than suggested by food instruction - Received item in 2 days from Seller - Outstanding Seller Customer Service - Happy Customer, Happy Wife, Happy Stomach, Happy Life Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Combo-Wall oven is a great addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Combo-Wall oven is a great addition to our kitchen; makes cooking fun and easy to use. Baked foods taste and look better now. The convection oven is so much better to bake with. A month later I'm still waiting for my receipt in order to verify my warranty.
customer_reviews.author: tom reina

customer_reviews.title: The micro heats up foods like a dream
customer_reviews.text: The micro heats up foods like a dream! Baking/confection baking is just awesome. But I spent 3 days reading the manual and tried to remember all the steps to use them and I can't remember much..guess I'll have to refer back to the manual til I get it.... But it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: purple cloud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I save $1300 by buying this on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Underwood
